label: PaymentPenaltyTerms
comment: Trade terms and conditions by which a penalty is or can be applied to a payable amount.

datatypeProperties.comment: A monetary value of the actual penalty in these trade payment penalty terms.
A monetary value used as a basis to calculate the discount in these trade payment discount terms.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value used as the basis for this trade price.
The measure of the basis period for these trade payment discount terms.
The calculation percentage for this trade price.

referencedBy.comment: Trade payment penalty terms applicable to these trade payment terms.
